name: How The Forest Was Born
description:
If you like the game, make sure to subscribe to our Kickstarter Page How The Forest Was Born is currently in development, you can download and play the tutorial and a part of the first level.
  • Play as a Leshy — a caring spirit of forests, a character from Slavic legends and folklore
  • Animals are your friends (Units, when we talk about strategy games) — build Animal Holes wherever you want (it's up to you, it's your strategy) and summon Rabbits, Foxes, Wolves, Bears to help you to protect the Forest
  • Catch Fireflies (also known as Resources in other strategy games) to grow your Forest
  • Improve your skills and abilities, and use Magic and Totems to keep Villagers and Monsters out of your Forest
  • Face dangerous Villagers, like Lumberjacks or Archers, who want to cut down your trees and kill the animals. But Villagers are not the single source of danger — creatures corrupted by Black Magic are eager to destroy the Tree of Life and steal the source of magic 
  • Beautiful, hand-drawn, atmospheric levels, each one has a unique color scheme, weather, environment, and secrets.
  • Progress through the game and see, how Forests are changing the in-game world and make it only better 
How The Forest Was Born is currently being developed by TILЁ Games. The release date is currently unknown. To get the latest updates follow us on Twitter and/or Instagram or join our Discord server.  Music and Audio: Chazzi Allstar
